A displacement in three-dimensional space.

Miorel-Lucian Palii

Field Detail

MAGNITUDE_ORDER

public static final Comparator<Vector> MAGNITUDE_ORDER
A comparator that orders vectors by their magnitude. There is no breaking of ties, so watch out for that if you need a stable sort.

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)

Indicates whether another object is equal to this vector.

To be equal, the object must also be a vector and have the same coordinates as this one (according to Double.equals(Object)). There are a couple of cases in which this could get you into trouble, a subtle one being positive vs. negative zero. A more obvious one would be rounding error. Therefore, in general, it would probably be more useful to do comparisons by looking at the magnitude of the difference of two vectors.

Overrides:
equals in class Object
